name: Avoid having Copybooks with reserved prefix (PL1)
description:
This rule searches all the Copybooks using reserved prefixes like below:
- CEE : IBM routines 
- DFH : CICS vendor modules
- IGY : Cobol
- EYU : Cicsplex SM
- DSN : DB2
- CTG : CTG
- CSQ / MQ  : MQ framework
output:
The report lists all the Copybook not following the Naming Convention for the Prefix.
It provides following information: 
- Copybook full name
rationale: These prefixes are used as a standard by software vendors and modules could overlap.
remediation: Verify the copybooks in violation are not your custom copybooks. If this is the case, change their name to avoid any confusion.
